mdRecord.dcterms:title: Who will care for Micky now?: A parody on "Who will care for Mother now?" / by Eugene T. Johnston
Arrah! Molly darlin' I am drafted
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnston, Eugene T. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Civil War song sheet (without the music) [original]
First line: "Arrah! Molly darlin' I am drafted." [original]
Three verses and chorus; blue ink on ruled paper; without border; headpiece Magnus 227, col. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: E647 .S63 no. 11: Boxed together with other Civil War song sheets. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M1628.3 .C6 1861 no.24: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Twenty-fourth of 25 song sheets which were mounted in an unidentified scrapbook. Rehoused, 2009. [original]
